name: Hypnosis
desc: Implant suggestions and triggers. (MEN)

name: Shapeshifting
desc: Mist forms, wolf-like attributes, or bat-like wings. (PHYS)

name: Wall-Walking
desc: Scale sheer surfaces like a spider.

name: Dreamwalking
desc: Invade and shape dreams, feed subtly. (MEN)

name: Voice of Command
desc: Direct orders instantly obeyed by thralls/weaker minds. (MEN)

name: Shadowform
desc: Become a living shadow, slip through cracks/hide. (PHYS)

name: True Polymorph
desc: Full animal transformation (wolf or bat). (PHYS)

name: Domination
desc: Full mental control over mortals; rivals may resist. (MEN)

name: Mist Form (Full)
desc: Dissolve into fog, immune to physical harm for a short time. (PHYS)

name: Chi Manipulation
desc: Store, transfer, or balance yin/yang chi between beings. (MEN)

name: Dreamwalking
desc: Invade dreams, subtly feed, induce nightmares/ecstasy. (MEN)

name: Chi Step
desc: Short bursts of superhuman speed and agility. (DEX)

name: Yin Shroud
desc: Cloak themselves in shadow and silence.

name: Yang Flame
desc: Radiate heat, vitality, or raw force outward in an aura.

name: Spectral Grip
desc: Manifest yin chi as chains or claws of shadow; restrain or damage foes. (PHYS)

name: Climbing
desc: Climb walls and ceilings.

name: Tail Slap
desc: Powerful tail attack; Physical roll to hit.

name: Pheromone Cloud
desc: Arouses/lowers thinking of targets within 5 ft; -1 Mental.

name: Burrow
desc: Travel underground in outdoor/city terrain; cannot penetrate ships’ hulls.

name: Quill Cloud
desc: Covered in dangerous spines/quills; attackers take 1 damage; can fire spines.

name: Biofusion
desc: Temporarily merge with living systems; heal, communicate, redirect energy; situational utility/healing.

name: Circuit Whisper
desc: Speak directly to Ark’s infrastructure; coax machinery/AI into harmony/repair.

name: Pulse Bloom
desc: Emit radiant pulse affecting flora/nearby minds; accelerate growth, restore morale/clarity.

name: Echo Memory
desc: Access residual emotional imprints; replay/interpret past events in biodomes/spaces.

name: Sanctuary Field
desc: Generate protective aura; stabilizes temp, oxygen, humidity in 10ft radius.

name: Shadow Archive
desc: Absorb/store memories/data fragments; retrieve later for leverage/insight.

name: Glimmerstep
desc: Move silently/invisibly; faint shimmer only; stealth mobility.

name: Emotion Theft
desc: Siphon dominant emotion; target suffers −1 Mental or relevant roll; user gains situational bonus (+1 Mental) for 1 turn.

name: Mask of Echoes
desc: Mimic voice, appearance, or aura; copy another’s likeness for 1–3 turns.

name: Entropy Pulse
desc: Destabilize tech or magic; minor malfunctions, frayed illusions, weakened constructs (−1 TN or effect for 1 turn).
